pkgmetadata.longdescription: Hypothesis Testing Using the Overlapping Interval Estimates // Performs hypothesis testing using the interval estimates (e.g., confidence intervals). The non-overlapping interval estimates indicates the statistical significance. References to these procedures can be found at Noguchi and Marmolejo-Ramos (2016) doi:10.1080/00031305.2016.1200487, Bonett and Seier (2003) doi:10.1198/0003130032323, and Lemm (2006) doi:10.1300/J082v51n02_05.
